moves.2. d4 d5: Follows Fischer VS Petrosian for about six moves.
moves.12... Bf5 13. Nc5: Aggressive move pointing at many weaknesses, b7, f7.
moves.18. a3 Qb7 19. Ne5 Nxe5 20. Bxe5 Bxe5 21: Attacks weakness on d5 and f7.
moves.22... e6 23. h4: Attempts to crack open holes around king.
moves.24. Qf4: Continues attack on holes around king.
moves.24... b4 25. axb4 a5 26. Qh6: Traps king in corner by controlling f8 square.
moves.28... Rc6: Rooks are useless in this position.
moves.29... Qf6: Perhaps to put queen on g7.
moves.30. Rexh5:
Pawn takes rook means QxQ.

All annotations are by knife edge loop, transcribed by me.
